ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( fpro__Service_Name__c = 'Field Actions', TEXT(fpro__Field_Action__c) = 'Field Cloning', fpro__Clone_on_same_object__c, fpro__API_Name_Add_Prefix__c = null, fpro__API_Name_Add_Suffix__c = null )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input "Prefix" or "Suffix" when cloning in same object
